entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47401
  • Encoded plus sign in image mediaType for container publish #47399
  • dotnet watch crashes with "An unexpected error ocurred" #47392

Closed

  • .NET 9 SDK introduces hang in `dotnet format` when run on Azure Pipelines in combination with NB.GV #44951
  • 9.0.103 breaks "dotnet restore" in WSL #47396

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet package list should not throw if project not specified #47402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implicit restore dotnet list package #47400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • enforce OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Generate the sdk msi bundles inside the VMR on windows BuildPass=2 verticals #47397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet test improvements for MTP #47395
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Delete GetTestsProject task #47394
    untriaged

Merged

  • NuGetPackageDownloader: Only verify signing on windows by default #47321
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2658528 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixup sourcelink information #47363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Attempt to Fix and Re-enable HasIncludedFiles Test #47220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [9.0.3xx] Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #47021
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
